|rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = |rad2cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== [http://pc.watch.impress.co.jp/docs/column/inoue/20120710_545831.html On '''pc.watch.impress.co.jp'''] :Maximum 600Mbps on the 5GHz band ([https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_WLAN_channels 5GHz use is a bit wonky in '''Japan''']) :'''BUFFALO-XXXXXX_A''' and '''BUFFALO-XXXXXX_G''' default SSID patterns :10:6F:3F OUI :'''Asian Power Devices''' power supply {{seealso|Buffalo WZR-D1800H}} ==Links of Interest== [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=155100&postdays=0&postorder=asc&start=480 Brief mention on the D1800H post on the '''DD-WRT Forum''']
